name: Ant Factory (itch) (Shad Amethyst)
description:
Ant Factory

Repair and automate a broken factory using ants:

  • Control different ants to get around puzzles
  • Automate the movement of each ant with pheromones
  • The other ants may be sacrificed

This game's source code is available Github under the BSD 3-Clause license. You can also play the latest version of the game on github.io.

This version is currently more of a demonstration than a full game, see the "future of the game" section on github for more info.
